channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Faulty Light on block of flats, 4th December
item.description:
The outside light on the wall of block of flats at junction of Newlands park/Lennard Road has been flashing on and off continuously for weeks now. Very annoying for people in the flats opposite. Please can it be fixed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lennard Road, Penge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sofa and bags of waste outside 394/392 Queensbridge Road, 4th December
item.description:
There has been a sofa left in the street and also two bags of what appears to be decorating rubbish - wallpaper etc The bags are next to the tree outside my house. It’s all been there a few days now

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Queensbridge Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rosendale Road SE21 on public footpat, 4th December
item.description:
Rosendale Road SE21 on public footpath between the north end of Lairdale Estate and footpath streetlight column ID number 77 you have recently installed dual car charging points. At the back of footpath are two cabinets – one black (telecom) and green cabinet which I assume relates to car charges as new ie Lambeth property. Remove graffiti please. Please forward fixmystreet.com link to your contractor for picture and Google Streetview link – NB link does not show car charger as the green cabinet as new: https://www.google.com/maps/place/Rosendale+Rd,+Norwood,+London/@51.4468004,-0.0996209,3a,15y,159.19h,88.36t/data=!3m7!1e1!3m5!1sfAA1FwNrrgmxoUdGbS24kA!2e0!6shttps:%2F%2Fstreetviewpixels-pa.googleapis.com%2Fv1%2Fthumbnail%3Fcb_client%3Dmaps_sv.tactile%26w%3D900%26h%3D600%26pitch%3D1.6362814732536748%26panoid%3DfAA1FwNrrgmxoUdGbS24kA%26yaw%3D159.19352489334256!7i16384!8i8192!4m6!3m5!1s0x487604063a15a687:0x5a39a8519c416f51!8m2!3d51.4408141!4d-0.0961998!16s%2Fg%2F1vm_xbvd?entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MTIwMi4wIKXMDSoASAFQAw%3D%3D

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 22-23, Burrow Walk, Tulse Hill, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Kenilworth Rd - tree near junction with Priory Park Rd, 4th December
item.description:
Dumped boxes and rubbish. Boxes clearly labelled with name and address (33A Kenilworth Rd) - see photographs attached. Common dumping site - packages with same address frequently dumped here. On their own street. Outside their own property. The mind boggles. Brent Council - please act!

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Priory Park Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Fly-tip Small - Less than one bag
